item.title: Staying Out of the Clouds
item.description:
While the use of “the cloud” is widespread in information technology, understanding its complexities is crucial. The cloud often represents large, intricate networks that users may not fully comprehend. Although many users are content with the cloud’s seemingly magical abilities, David G. Rusin, CEO of American Fiber Systems, argues against perceiving internet clouds as uniform entities. He emphasizes the differences in integrity, reliability, and delivery among cloud providers, highlighting the importance of scrutinizing these aspects...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/staying-out-of-the-clouds/
